bdi4jade.goal

Interface BeliefGoal<K>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, Goal, java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Term
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeliefNotNullValueGoal, BeliefNotPresentGoal, BeliefPresentGoal, BeliefSetHasValueGoal, BeliefValueGoal, PropositionalBeliefValueGoal

    public interface BeliefGoal<K>
extends Goal
    This class represents the goal of an agent to believe in a certain belief, that is, the agent has a belief whose name is specified in this goal.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      K getBeliefName()
      Returns the name of the belief associated with this goal.
      boolean isAchieved(BeliefBase beliefBase)
      Checks whether this goal is achieved by checking the provided belief base.

    • Method Detail

      • getBeliefName

        K getBeliefName()
        Returns the name of the belief associated with this goal.
        Returns:
        the belief name.

      • isAchieved

        boolean isAchieved(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Checks whether this goal is achieved by checking the provided belief base.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if goal was achieved, false otherwise.
